content:
The Marie Curie Alumni Association (MCAA) organises its virtual conference on 6-7 November (Link)

An online workshop on the "interface between Neuroscience, AI and Policy making" will be held on Fri 6 Nov at 15.45 CET Featuring:

  • Nadia Metoui, U Amsterdam, The Netherlands
  • Michele Giugliano, SISSA, Pisa, Italy
  • Renaud Jolivet, CERN, U Geneva, Switzerland
  • Ricardo Chavarriaga CLAIRE Office Switzerland

See more information on the recent MoU for collaboration between MCAA and CLAIRE
